
{{alias}}( x, y )
    Returns the minimum value.

    If one operand is NaN, the other operand is always returned.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        First number.

    y: number
        Second number.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Minimum value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 3.14, 4.2 )
    3.14
    > v = {{alias}}( 3.14, NaN )
    3.14
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN, 4.2 )
    4.2
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN, NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
